fb7d2136-6812-470f-959d-835e1934c802:
A ray of sickly greenish-gray negative energy issues forth from the palm of your hand.
Make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against the target. A creature hit by this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is wracked by painful spasms as its muscles and sinews wither and twist.
The subject takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you possess (maximum 5d4 each). This spell cannot reduce an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} below 1. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves the damage.
ff7e8789-4f47-447b-8fda-a57bb1761f15: A spray of acid erupts from your outstretched hand, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6) to each creature within its area (Reflex half). This acid continues to burn for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. At the end of this round every creatures that failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} must succeed on another Reflex save or receive 1d6 points of acid {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 7d6).
d838be43-e363-4036-9589-9aefd46f164b: All allies within 30 feet gain resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashes{/g}. They gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/adamantine. It ignores the first 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each time it takes damage from a weapon, though an adamantine weapon overcomes the reduction. Once the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 150 points), it is discharged.
3679a54d-9da0-4fd8-a1d1-c885de182d36: Allies in the area of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} at the time of casting gain a +1 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against fear effects, plus 1 temporary hit point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 20).
3958ca90-5634-43f4-93a7-0ab2a330faa0: Cone of cold creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and extending outward in a cone. It drains heat, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6).
5fe23247-3fe7-4499-83b9-8a9b0f3443a6: Mind fog produces a bank of thin mist that weakens the mental resistance of those caught in it. Creatures in the mind fog take a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} and Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. A creature that successfully saves against the fog is not affected and need not make further saves even if it remains in the fog. Affected creatures take the penalty as long as they remain in the fog and for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} thereafter.
7b850757-8e57-40ec-8742-b5fccecacbbc:
Negative energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +25) to nearby living enemies.
Like other inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, it cures undead in its area rather than damaging them. A cleric capable of spontaneously casting inflict spells can also spontaneously cast mass inflict spells.
e5a72d7a-b7f7-46d1-aa4f-1fca3e763201: Shards of rock drop from above, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g} and piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (Reflex half). A creature that fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} is pinned to the ground under stalactites and rubble, gaining the entangled condition until it can free itself with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} or DC 20 {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g}.
d44d2109-b508-4074-bab2-ba0ae4fb0d54:
The target animal grows to twice its normal {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} and eight times its normal weight. This alteration changes the animal's size category to the next largest, grants it a +8 size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and a +4 size bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} (and thus an extra 2 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per HD), and imposes a –2 size {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. The creature's existing natural armor bonus to AC increases by 2.
The size change also affects the animal's modifier to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, and its base {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The animal's space and {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} change as appropriate to the new size, but its {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} does not change. Multiple magical effects that increase size do not stack.
4be50ab1-fc94-436e-bf9b-d2fee571adc8: The target creature becomes a leopard. It gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and a +2 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. It also gains two {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and one 1d6 bite attack.
121285a4-2348-43a3-9a9a-fb822f1a40db:
The target creature becomes a small air elemental. It gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, a +2 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, resist electricity 20, and vulnerability to acid. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 30 feet. It also gains one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and the whirlwind ability.
Whirlwind: An air elemental can transform itself into a whirlwind and back again. A whirlwind is 5 feet wide, and every creature that spends a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} in the whirlwind must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or take 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}. While in whirlwind form, it cannot attack but it is able to use its abilities.
f240ad96-9001-4677-9dc4-c84bd042aa0a: The target creature becomes a small earth elemental. It gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +4 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and a +1 bonus to its {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. It also gains one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} slam attack, resist acid 20, and vulnerability to electricity.
bcc8aa99-26d1-4193-80a7-8777d7f82dee:
The target creature becomes a small fire elemental. It gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, a +2 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, resist fire 20, and vulnerability to cold. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 20 feet. It also gains one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and the burn ability.
Burn: A fire elemental deals 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the burn ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or catch fire, taking 1d4 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a burning creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take fire damage as though hit by the burning creature and must make a Reflex save to avoid catching fire.
6020b9c9-7e78-4d66-8a8e-6d8e17361c56:
The target creature becomes a small water elemental. It gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +4 form natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, resist cold 20, and vulnerability to fire. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. It also gains one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and the freeze ability.
Freeze: A water elemental deals 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the freeze ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or start freezing, taking 1d4 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a freezing creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take cold damage as though hit by the freezing creature and must make a Reflex save to avoid freezing.
1c206231-eb7b-4682-93ed-30fbd6008c87: The target creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores each drop to 1. The affected creature is unable to use Intelligence- or Charisma-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} or cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. Still, it knows who its friends are and can follow them and even protect them. The subject remains in this state until a {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} or break enchantment spell is used to cancel the effect of the feeblemind. A creature that can cast arcane spells, such as a sorcerer or a wizard, takes a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}.
c387b7ad-2792-4a34-bbbb-161522136f22: The target gains {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 12 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
29e1774c-fae3-46cc-b1da-2820a2406ae9: This character is constricted as if by the coils of a large snake, taking {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}+6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} that it fails its Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}.
92fef3fd-ccf7-46bd-81c9-0d99839794f2: This creature can create a stalactites trap
ee44ac56-fdd0-4d8a-80b7-6084987b4a1e: This creature can create a stalagmites trap
da6eb821-8cf9-4b1d-8828-767724b51bb2: This creature is in djinni form now.
284e0f0f-d32f-40f6-9bfd-767554c8c7f5:
This creature is in dog form now. It can't {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores equal 1, and it lost any ability it had to cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} or use {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 10 feet.
As long as baleful polymorph remains in effect, the target cannot use other polymorph spells or effects to assume a new form. Baleful polymorph can be removed by the remove curse spell.
ffca6fe0-4883-4f94-8fa1-812ea1cef7b3: This creature is in efreeti form now.
3e72f5d8-1d2a-431a-8cf6-f3c35573cd60: This creature is in marid form now.
70b6b445-846a-474f-8e60-04c303f96cc9: This creature is in shaitan form now.
1664c077-aca2-49d0-be2d-db04edd95af7: This creature is now under other's domination.
4bfab115-1ecf-4698-acc8-aabd6b3e60b0: This creature is pinned to the ground under stalactites and rubble and tries to escape.
bc425ded-b0a1-452e-9053-0119d6887ad8: This creature moves through the dense rubble and takes –5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} and –2 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}.
8c11eba3-9185-44f2-8fab-0fe3372756e4: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} causes those within the area to turn on each other rather than {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} their foes. Each affected creature has a 50% chance to attack the nearest target each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}Roll{/g} to determine each creature's behavior every round at the beginning of its turn.) A creature that does not attack its nearest neighbor is free to act normally for that round.
6c9799c6-f7d1-4279-afb4-07308a899fc2: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} cures {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +25) and ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting you: {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}, blinded, confused, dazzled, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, and sickened.
a4efc926-9a74-4ac9-b7b4-511b604b766e: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} forces an extraplanar creature back to its proper plane if it fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}. If the spell is successful, the creature is instantly whisked away.
fb00b951-d54c-4547-b8e9-a000d24f3f70: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} frees victims from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.[LONGSTART] Break enchantment can reverse even an instantaneous effect. For each such effect, you make a {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + caster level, maximum +15) against a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 11 + caster level of the effect. Success means that the creature is free of the spell, curse, or effect. Break enchantment only works on spells of 5th level or lower.[LONGEND]
b24c9baf-b0c5-4dae-89d8-6b087490f7a0:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as cacophonous call, except that is affects multiple creatures.
Cacophonous Call: You fill your target's mind with a blaring cacophony of discordant sounds, making it hard for the target to act and {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentrate{/g}. The creature gains the nauseated condition for the duration of the spell if it fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}.
8bfb7c8a-85dd-4d73-af52-bfe0a9c89502:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as castigate, except it affects many creatures.
Castigate: You compel the target to beg for forgiveness. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}, the target cowers in fear. On a successful save, it is instead shaken for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Each round after, a cowering subject may attempt a new save to end the effect.
109a20d8-f8b2-41c0-8d41-94b6bb419553: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as raise dead, but it only affects an animal companion or a familiar.
6c47c8da-2e4c-4d41-b2ae-bf1d19c8b88c:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like call lightning, except that each bolt deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} at long range, and you may call a maximum of 15 bolts.
Call Lightning: Immediately upon completion of the spell, and once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} thereafter, you may call down a bolt of lightning that deals 3d6 points of electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The bolt of lightning flashes down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within the spell's range (measured from your position at the time). Any creature in the target square or in the path of the bolt is affected. You need not call a bolt of lightning immediately; other {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, even spellcasting, can be performed first. Each round after the first, you may use a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentrating{/g} on the spell) to call a bolt. Each time you cast a bolt, the spell's duration is reduced by one minute.
7232cf2a-904b-423d-884b-a00e532164fb:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like hold monster, except that the target is constricted as if by the coils of a large snake, taking {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}+6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} that it fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}. A successful save ends both the paralyzing and constriction effects.
Hold Monster: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, even speech. Each round, the subject may attempt a new saving throw to end the effect.
865cfa88-c535-45e8-9e64-063f09209eff:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like hold person, except that it affects any living creature that fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}.
Hold Person: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, even speech. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the subject may attempt a new saving throw to end the effect.
a8d980ff-e818-4302-bdab-d1d94e1d2dac:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} generates a bank of fog, its vapors yellowish green and poisonous. These vapors automatically kill any living creature with 3 or fewer HD (no {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}). A living creature with 4 to 6 HD is slain unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save (in which case it takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} while in the cloud).
A living creature with more than 6 HD takes 1d4 points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}Constitution damage{/g} each round while in the cloud (a successful Fortitude save halves this damage). Holding one's breath doesn't help, but creatures immune to poison are unaffected by the spell.
The cloudkill moves away from you at 10 feet per round in the direction you are facing, rolling along the surface of the ground.
2cf5ed1c-b6f5-45ba-b360-54a48f29505b: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} makes a main-hand melee weapon deadly to undead. Any undead creature with HD equal to or less than your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or be destroyed utterly if struck in combat with this weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} does not apply against the destruction effect.
d4316831-03b0-4d0d-ac0b-4a3ea7ab35cf: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a large air elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
ce40c692-4718-479c-a119-2abdf0c432e2: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a large earth elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
abc2b104-d6af-4f67-9500-f5e58286c3c9: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a large fire elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
c9991c17-eb89-4058-b75e-7ad230672e58: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a large water elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
4e65b020-83fb-4bac-a4a0-94849370cb06: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side large fire, water, air, or earth elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
f3b3b6f3-ce24-47e7-9866-ade77e8ecfb6: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} transforms an allied creature into a leopard or a small elemental. The subject may choose to resume its normal form as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}; doing so ends the spell for that subject.
dc3253ec-eaa4-4f9b-97a6-d10ae32b72c9: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} wreathes you in shadowy energy and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damages{/g} those that make {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} against you. Any creature that strikes you with its body or a handheld weapon deals normal damage, but at the same time the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacker{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of negative {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +15). If the attacker has {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, it applies to this effect. When an attacker takes damage from this spell, you {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to 25% of the damage the spell dealt. Creatures with {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} weapons are not subject to this damage if they attack you.
5a04554b-49ba-4aa5-9293-8451fda97501:
Upon casting this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you must choose one type of genie to transform into, selecting from djinni, efreeti, marid, or shaitan. You retain your basic physical appearance but shift in some way to become more akin to the genie type you chose. While under the effects of geniekind, you gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning effects, and a +4 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. You are also unaffected by difficult terrain. In addition, you gain other abilities depending upon the type of genie you choose to assume the form of, as detailed below.
Djinni: Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. You gain resist electricity 10.
Efreeti: Your unarmed strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal +1d6 points of fire {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You gain resist fire 10.
Marid: Your unarmed strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal +1d6 points of cold damage. You gain resist cold 10.
Shaitan: Your unarmed strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal +1d6 points of acid damage. You gain resist acid 10.
87dcd31e-fda3-48dd-a77f-8e433c770556: Using this scroll absolves you of your sins and returns your {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g} to the state it was at the 1st level.
d8977775-d576-4eca-af62-10a3bcc89ce3: Waves of negative energy render all living creatures in the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s area fatigued. This spell has no effect on a creature that is already fatigued.
2f7a9d83-b0ae-4e3e-9f61-c050243dadee: When you cast this on a creature, its skin turns slick and clammy and it is able to regenerate {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. While under the effects of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, the creature gains fast {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} 5, fire resistance 20, and a +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g}.
cc3a4fb3-8e97-4089-87a9-e74b3340e2c6: When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you can assume the form of a medium air elemental, medium earth elemental, medium fire elemental, or medium water elemental. The abilities you gain depend upon the type of elemental into which you change. Elemental abilities based on {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} use the size of the elemental you transform into to determine their effect.
bbf3f0f3-369b-40c5-8a4d-8fccd062d452: While under the effects of geniekind, you gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning effects, and a +4 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. You are also unaffected by difficult terrain. In addition, your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g}. You gain resist acid 10.
d4515594-ee29-4600-be10-ccffa981bfe2: While under the effects of geniekind, you gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning effects, and a +4 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. You are also unaffected by difficult terrain. In addition, your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}. You gain resist cold 10.
e63e97b7-1091-496c-8de9-9f5d129e41e7: While under the effects of geniekind, you gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning effects, and a +4 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. You are also unaffected by difficult terrain. In addition, your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. You gain resist electricity 10.
15a1af2e-bda3-4df5-aa85-3d1e2fc7dea3: While under the effects of geniekind, you gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning effects, and a +4 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. You are also unaffected by difficult terrain. In addition, your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes and any melee weapon you wield deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. You gain resist fire 10.
f034abd9-c563-4d09-9ad1-377cd7989c49:
You and all your allies within 30 feet are under True Seeing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
True Seeing: You confer on the subject the ability to see all things as they actually are. The subject sees the exact locations of creatures or objects under blur or displacement effects, sees invisible creatures normally.
5dc410a6-b47a-4549-93f5-3c16059f98c1: You are in leopard form now. You have a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and a +2 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. You also have two {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and one 1d6 bite attack. You may choose to resume your normal form as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}; doing so ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for you.
ae21805b-af4d-4305-9b75-3c8121650649: You are in small air elemental form now. You have a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, a +2 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, resist electricity 20, and vulnerability to acid. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 30 feet. You also gain one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and the whirlwind ability. You may choose to resume your normal form as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}; doing so ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for you.
957997ab-bd14-42f1-a435-14016a5f2149: You are in small earth elemental form now. You have a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +4 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and a +1 bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. You also have one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} slam attack, resist acid 20, and vulnerability to electricity. You may choose to resume your normal form as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}; doing so ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for you.
3659a306-ae1f-41ec-bcc5-8efec64942f0:
You are in small fire elemental form. You have a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, a +2 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, resist fire 20, and vulnerability to cold. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 20 feet. You also have one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and the burn ability. You may choose to resume your normal form as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}; doing so ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for you.
Burn: A fire elemental deals 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the burn ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or catch fire, taking 1d4 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a burning creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take fire damage as though hit by the burning creature and must make a Reflex save to avoid catching fire.
a6fc176d-1f19-481b-8406-1ce769ad1bd8:
You are in small water elemental form now. You have a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +4 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, resist cold 20, and vulnerability to fire. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. You also gain one {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and the freeze ability. You may choose to resume your normal form as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}; doing so ends the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for you.
Freeze: A water elemental deals 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} in addition to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt on a successful hit in melee. Those affected by the freeze ability must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or start freezing, taking 1d4 damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for an additional 1d4 rounds. Creatures that hit a freezing creature with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} take cold damage as though hit by the freezing creature and must make a Reflex save to avoid freezing.
a501ad63-71b3-4f54-8066-21989f9c51ad: You are surrounded by a nimbus of golden light. Any evil creature striking you with {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes, {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g}, or a handheld weapon deals normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, but at the same time, the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacker{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of damage + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +15). Creatures wielding melee weapons with {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} are not subject to this damage if they attack you. {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} applies against this damage. You also take half damage from magical attacks with the evil descriptor. If such an attack allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} for half damage, you take no damage on a successful saving throw.
9823fc00-ff8a-4ded-92fd-e6b6a8e06f66: You are surrounded by a nimbus of shadow. Any good creature striking you with {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes, {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g}, or a handheld weapon deals normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, but at the same time, the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacker{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of damage + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +15). Creatures wielding melee weapons with {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} are not subject to this damage if they attack you. {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} applies against this damage. You also take half damage from magical attacks with the good descriptor. If such an attack allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} for half damage, you take no damage on a successful saving throw.
c0f4427a-56c5-4ea3-81f9-c984bf7a2803: You automatically detect and locate conscious creatures within 60 feet, as if you possessed the blindsight ability.
218b487e-ba1f-4190-84d0-4bfcabcb902e: You can attempt to slay any one living creature. When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, your hand seethes with eerie dark fire. You must succeed on a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to touch the target. The target takes ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}12d6{/g} + 1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} succeeds, it instead takes (3d6 + 1 point per caster level) points of damage. The subject might die from damage even if it succeeds at its saving throw.
ff95f947-7693-4534-914b-faac40141c7a: You can make a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. This trip {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
9955e3b2-5df8-4f07-bd59-3445b94ffce0: You can make any humanoid creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However this creature will try to throw off the domination, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
26a46a95-6dce-4c45-9b01-4c56ea2f9c5f:
You change the subject into a dog. It can't {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores drop to 1, and it loses any ability it had to cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} or use {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 10 feet though.
Any polymorph effects on the target are automatically dispelled when a target fails to resist the effects of baleful polymorph, and as long as baleful polymorph remains in effect, the target cannot use other polymorph spells or effects to assume a new form. Baleful polymorph is a curse effect. {g|Encyclopedia:Incorporeal_Touch_Attack}Incorporeal{/g} creatures are immune to baleful polymorph.
52a5ac13-869d-4dfb-bf0a-21239d74805d: You conjure a pillar of positive energy in a single 5-foot square within range that radiates light as if it were a sunrod. Living creatures adjacent to the pillar can spend a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} the pillar and {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +20). Creatures can move into the square containing the pillar, but if an undead creature moves into the pillar it takes 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d6). Undead creatures vulnerable to bright light take 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d8). A creature cannot benefit or suffer more than once from a single casting of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
64c67497-f07b-4f94-917e-ee94be0bedc3: You create a 50-foot-long line of flames. The fire snake affects all enemies in the line, avoiding allies. Creatures in the path of the fire snake take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6).
f8963dca-e981-4002-9d42-c24daad40e47:
You create a magical trap in the area that causes deadly stalactites or stalagmites to "bite" an intruder. The magical trap is triggered whenever an enemy creature moves through the affected area. The effect of cave fangs depends on whether you create stalactites or stalagmites (see below). You can place these traps anywhere within close range as {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}; the trap's radius is 5 feet. Each time you place a trap, the spell's duration is reduced by 10 minutes.
Stalactites: Shards of rock drop from above, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g} and piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (Reflex half). A creature that fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} is pinned to the ground under stalactites and rubble, gaining the entangled condition until it can free itself with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} or DC 20 {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g}.
Stalagmites: Piercing spires of rock erupt up from the ground, dealing 3d8 points of piercing damage and knocking the creature prone (a successful Reflex saving throw halves this damage and avoids being knocked prone). Once the stalagmites appear, they function thereafter as spike stones for 1 minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and then crumble to dust.
08d704d5-3e6d-4e3f-88fb-2af775e89a2c:
You create an extradimensional hole with a depth of 10 feet per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 100 feet). The pit has the ability to squeeze and crush any creature trapped within it.
Any large or smaller creature standing in the area where you first conjured the pit must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to jump to safety in the nearest open space. In addition, the edges of the pit are sloped, and any creature ending its turn on a square adjacent to the pit must make a Reflex saving throw with a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to avoid falling into it. Creatures subjected to an effect intended to push them into the pit (such as bull rush) do not get a saving throw to avoid falling in if they are affected by the pushing effect.
Creatures who fall into the pit take falling {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as normal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per 10 feet). In addition, anyone within the pit takes 4d6 points of bludgeoning damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as the pit contracts and then returns to its normal {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} (a successful Reflex save halves this damage). The ever-shifting walls of the pit are quite difficult to scale: to climb them, a creature needs a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 35. When the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ends, creatures within the hole rise up with the bottom of the pit until they are standing on the surface over the course of a single round.
c1aaf1b6-65c2-4049-9ec4-5814b7d5c29d: You implant within the minds of your targets the illusion that they are engulfed in tangled webs teeming with swarms of tiny spiders. Those who fail to disbelieve the phantasmal web are treated as if in a web {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, but must also make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after that or become nauseated for that round by the phantasmal spiders. Freedom of movement allows unobstructed movement but does not negate nausea effects.
7c51eba9-c911-4f32-bf06-404b3bd3a347: You may call down a vertical bolt of lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. The bolt of lightning flashes down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within long range.
79060d46-44c9-4ba0-bbf1-dce257d71edc:
You must have a melee weapon in hand to cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, your weapon resounds. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. Your weapon is not harmed by this {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}.
If you are using your judgment ability or smite ability against the target, it is staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} on a successful attack. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} negates the staggering effect.
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, the target is stunned for 1 round and blinded for 1d6 rounds. A successful Fortitude save negates the stunning and blindness effects. If you are also using judgment or smite, your foe makes only a single save against all effects.
This spell immediately ends if your weapon leaves your hand.
Resounding blow stacks with the thundering weapon property.
3355d508-0ecc-41aa-b5c0-b69c10b69fc9:
You restore life to a deceased party member. A raised creature has a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to its current HD. Raise dead also removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}'s door condition.
Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The subject of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} gains two permanent negative levels when it is raised, just as if it had been hit by an energy-draining creature, though it can not gain a number of negative levels equal to or greater than its total {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} this way.
A creature whose permanent negative levels already equal its Hit Dice cannot be brought back to life through raise dead.
02c148dc-edf4-4088-a93e-aeebb63974e7: You surround the touched creatures with a constant and moveable 1 inch thick shell of tolerable living conditions. This shell enables the subjects to breathe freely, even underwater or in a vacuum, as well as making them immune to harmful gases and vapors, including inhaled diseases and poisons and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} like cloudkill and stinking cloud.
db1ff7dd-5fbc-4068-b40d-55027d0448cd: You tap energy from the Plane of Shadow to cast a quasi-real, illusory version of a fireball, lightning bolt, shout, volcanic storm, or ice storm {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. Spells that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} have normal effects unless an affected creature succeeds at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}. Each disbelieving creature takes only one-fifth damage from the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. Regardless of the result of the save to disbelieve, an affected creature is also allowed any save (or {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}) that the spell being simulated allows, but the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is set according to shadow evocation's level (5th) rather than the spell's normal level.
d108b0c4-9f69-4620-ac6f-c35c6e8d5ce6: You trap the target in solid ice. If the creature fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}, it is paralyzed, if the target makes its save, it gains the entangled condition but can otherwise act normally. Whether or not the target saves, it takes 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} it is paralyzed or entangled in the ice. A creature can break the ice with a successful Fortitude saving throw against your normal spell DC each round after receiving the effect.
ac1a9f58-5edc-4bd9-8f29-51858d369387:
Your height immediately doubles, and your weight increases by a factor of eight. This increase changes your {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category to the next larger one. You gain a +4 size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} and take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. You gain a +2 form bonus to your natural armor. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/evil (if you are good or neutral) or DR 5/good (if you are evil). At 15th level, this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction becomes 10/evil or 10/good (the maximum).
Your size modifier for {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} changes as appropriate to your new size category. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} doesn't change your {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. Determine space and {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} as appropriate to your new size. All equipment you wear or carry is similarly enlarged by the spell. Weapons deal more damage.
Magical effects that increase size do not stack.
494b93e5-ee67-48d7-ac02-c3ce1e99d4dc: Your main-hand melee weapon is deadly to undead. Any undead creature with HD equal to or less than your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or be destroyed utterly if struck in combat with this weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} does not apply against the destruction effect.
7c5e4deb-9170-4671-9a0b-2a198bcf7cb9: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}Piercing{/g} spires of rock erupt up from the ground, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and knocking the creature prone (a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} halves this damage and avoids being knocked prone). Once the stalagmites appear, they function thereafter as spike stones for 1 minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and then crumble to dust.
